CustomField.formula: IF(AND(TODAY() - AcctSeed__Due_Date2__c <= 0,(ROUND(AcctSeed__Balance__c, 2) > 0)), "0-Current", IF(AND(30 >= TODAY() - AcctSeed__Due_Date2__c, TODAY() - AcctSeed__Due_Date2__c > 0, (ROUND(AcctSeed__Balance__c, 2) > 0)), "1-30 Days", IF(AND(60 >= TODAY() - AcctSeed__Due_Date2__c, TODAY() - AcctSeed__Due_Date2__c > 0, (ROUND(AcctSeed__Balance__c, 2) > 0)), "31-60 Days", IF(AND(90 >= TODAY() - AcctSeed__Due_Date2__c, TODAY() - AcctSeed__Due_Date2__c > 0, (ROUND(AcctSeed__Balance__c, 2) > 0)), "61-90 Days", IF(AND(TODAY() - AcctSeed__Due_Date2__c > 90, (ROUND(AcctSeed__Balance__c, 2) > 0)), "Over 90 Days", IF(AND(ROUND(AcctSeed__Balance__c, 2) = 0, TEXT(AcctSeed__Status__c) = "Posted"), "Closed", ""))))))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Measures the current age of the balance of the billing. Used to monitor collection of balance.
CustomField.label: Age
